00028 #include "qf_pkg.h"
00029 #include "qassert.h"
00030 
00031 Q_DEFINE_THIS_MODULE(qeq_fifo)
00032 
00033 
00040 /*..........................................................................*/
00041 void QEQueue_postFIFO(QEQueue *me, QEvent const *e) {
00042     QF_INT_LOCK_KEY_
00043     QF_INT_LOCK_();
00044 
00045     QS_BEGIN_NOLOCK_(QS_QF_EQUEUE_POST_FIFO, QS_eqObj_, me)
00046         QS_TIME_();                                            /* timestamp */
00047         QS_SIG_(e->sig);                        /* the signal of this event */
00048         QS_OBJ_(me);                                   /* this queue object */
00049         QS_U8_(e->dynamic_);          /* the dynamic attribute of the event */
00050         QS_EQC_(me->nFree);                       /* number of free entries */
00051         QS_EQC_(me->nMin);                    /* min number of free entries */
00052     QS_END_NOLOCK_()
00053 
00054     if (e->dynamic_ != (uint8_t)0) {                 /* is it a pool event? */
00055         ++((QEvent *)e)->dynamic_;       /* increment the reference counter */
00056                    /* NOTE: cast the 'const' away, which is legitimate because
00057                     * it's a dynamic event
00058                     */
00059     }
00060 
00061     if (me->frontEvt == (QEvent *)0) {               /* is the queue empty? */
00062         me->frontEvt = e;                         /* deliver event directly */
00063     }
00064     else {            /* queue is not empty, leave event in the ring-buffer */
00065             /* the queue must be able to accept the event (cannot overflow) */
00066         Q_ASSERT(me->nFree != (QEQueueCtr)0);
00067 
00068         me->ring[me->head] = e;      /* insert event into the buffer (FIFO) */
00069         if (me->head == (QEQueueCtr)0) {          /* need to wrap the head? */
00070             me->head = me->end;                              /* wrap around */
00071         }
00072         --me->head;
00073 
00074         --me->nFree;                        /* update number of free events */
00075         if (me->nMin > me->nFree) {
00076             me->nMin = me->nFree;                  /* update minimum so far */
00077         }
00078     }
00079     QF_INT_UNLOCK_();
00080 }
